statements: SELECT * FROM ReturnsExchanges;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason, exchange_requested FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE exchange_requested = TRUE;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE return_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT return_id, product_id, exchange_requested FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY return_id;
SELECT * FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE return_reason='Wrong size' ORDER BY return_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_date FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE exchange_requested=true AND return_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND exchange_requested=false ORDER BY return_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE exchange_requested=true AND return_reason LIKE '%damaged%' ORDER BY product_id ASC, return_reason DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT return_id, product_id, exchange_requested FROM ReturnsExchanges WHERE product_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' AND return_reason IS NULL ORDER BY return_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT exchange_id, product_id, exchange_reason FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returns ORDER BY return_id DESC;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_reason LIKE 'Damaged%';
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE product_id = 2 ORDER BY return_reason DESC;
SELECT exchange_id, product_id FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_id = 3 AND product_id = 4;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE product_id = 3 OR return_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY exchange_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, reason FROM Exchanges WHERE exchange_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM Users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT exchange_id, old_product_id, new_product_id, exchange_date FROM Exchanges ORDER BY exchange_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM Users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Returns JOIN Users ON Returns.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE reason = 'Defective' AND return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM Returns WHERE return_reason = 'Defective';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Exchanges WHERE exchange_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%street%';
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Returns r INNER JOIN Products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.price > 100 AND r.return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Returns;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason FROM Returns;
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM Returns ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_reason FROM Exchanges ORDER BY exchange_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT User.username, Returns.return_reason FROM Users JOIN Returns ON Users.user_id = Returns.user_id WHERE Returns.return_reason = 'Wrong size';

SELECT Users.username, DefectiveProducts.product_name, Exchanges.exchange_reason FROM Users JOIN Exchanges ON Users.user_id = Exchanges.user_id JOIN DefectiveProducts ON Exchanges.product_id = DefectiveProducts.product_id;

SELECT Users.username, UnwantedProducts.product_name, UnwantedProducts.return_date FROM Users JOIN UnwantedProducts ON Users.user_id = UnwantedProducts.user_id WHERE Users.address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT Returns.return_id, Returns.product_id, Exchanges.exchange_reason FROM Exchanges JOIN Returns ON Exchanges.product_id = Returns.product_id WHERE Returns.return_date < '2022-05-01';
